title: Mayuri Chandbali Jhumka: Exquisite Peacock Earrings with Coral Accents
materials: 22K Gold (916 Gold) with Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster. Adorned with high-quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones for brilliant sparkle
Genuine Coral beads (Pagadam) with a vibrant orange-red hue and a genuine Ruby in each piece.
features: Inspired by traditional South Indian designs, these Chandbali Jhumka earrings feature a gracefully crafted peacock (Mayuri) motif encrusted with CZ stones. The earrings display a delicate filigree style that shows modern refinement. The dangling Coral beads add a touch of elegance and tradition. These earrings use a screw mechanism for secure wear.
colors: Predominantly gold with white Cubic Zirconia. The Coral beads introduce a warm orange-red
creating a striking contrast. A small ruby adding a small touch of dark red.
occasions: and special occasions like Seemantham or half-saree functions. Their modern yet traditional design also makes them suitable for contemporary parties and events.
description: These earrings showcase the perfect fusion of tradition and contemporary style. The peacock motif symbolizes beauty and grace, and the coral beads bring prosperity. Crafted by skilled artisans using time-honored techniques, these earrings are durable, comfortable to wear, and a timeless addition to any jewelry collection. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a long-lasting shine, making them a treasured heirloom.
